checks.title: Floors swept and free of debris
checks.description: Verify main floor areas are clean with no visible trash or spills
checks.pass_criteria: Clean floors with no debris, spills cleaned promptly
checks.fail_criteria: Visible trash, spills, or dirty appearance
checks.image_prompt: Photo of main floor area showing cleanliness

checks.title: Windows and glass doors clean
checks.description: Check that entrance and display windows are clean and streak-free
checks.pass_criteria: Clean glass with no smudges, fingerprints, or streaks
checks.fail_criteria: Dirty windows, visible smudges, or streaked glass
checks.image_prompt: Photo of front windows or glass entrance doors

checks.title: Restrooms clean and stocked
checks.description: Verify restrooms are clean with supplies available
checks.pass_criteria: Clean fixtures, stocked supplies, no odors
checks.fail_criteria: Dirty restroom, empty dispensers, or unpleasant odor
checks.image_prompt: Photo of restroom showing overall condition

checks.title: Dust-free shelves and displays
checks.description: Check that shelving units and product displays are dusted and clean
checks.pass_criteria: No visible dust on shelves or display fixtures
checks.fail_criteria: Dusty shelves, dirty fixtures, or grimy appearance
checks.image_prompt: Photo of shelf edges and display tops

checks.title: Fitting rooms tidy and organized
checks.description: Verify fitting rooms are clean with no leftover items or trash
checks.pass_criteria: Clean rooms, hooks working, no trash or abandoned items
checks.fail_criteria: Messy rooms, broken fixtures, or uncleaned

checks.title: Break room and back area organized
checks.description: Check that staff areas are clean and don't detract from store appearance
checks.pass_criteria: Organized space, no overflow into customer areas
checks.fail_criteria: Cluttered, visible from sales floor, or unsanitary
checks.image_prompt: Photo of staff break area or back room entrance
